page.title: 10WORSHIP IN S.W.WILMSLOW
page.content: We sent questionnaires to the four churches in our area.They were a {Methodist chapel,a Church of England {church,a Non-Denominational chapel and {a Kingdom Hall of the Jehovah's {Witnesses.}There are no places of worship for{Catholics, Muslims,Jews {or Hindus}in this area. None of the churches is ever full except on important festivals such as Harvest Festival or for the Christmas Carol Service which attract the largest congregations. For normal services an average of between 40 and 80 people attend. All ages attend the churches which hold between two and four services a week. The Jehovah's Witnesses did not reply to the questionnaire for religious reasons.
